column2: Nutrien Ltd. is a crop nutrient company, which engages in the production and distribution of products for agricultural, industrial, and feed customer. The company is headquartered in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan and currently employs 20,300 full-time employees. The firm is focused on retail, potash, nitrogen and phosphate mining and processing operations. The firm's retail operations serve growers in a number of countries across the United States, Canada, South Africa, Australia and South America. The firm operates six potash mines in Saskatchewan and has a mine in New Brunswick in care-and-maintenance mode. The firm operates integrated phosphate mining and processing facilities, as well as a number of smaller upgrading plants in the United States.
